sentences.en: A minimum 28,800 bps modem is probably the slowest you'll want to put up with.
sentences.cn: 传输速度为28,800比特/秒的调制解调器很可能是你愿意忍受的最低速度的解调器。

sentences.en: Also, by modem standards, the code appears crude and lacking in humanity.
sentences.cn: 而且在现代人看来, 这部法典也显得粗糙,缺乏人道.

sentences.en: Biomedical research, like everything else in the modem world, is happening faster and faster.
sentences.cn: 同当代其他一切事物一样,生物医学研究的进程也越来越快.

sentences.en: Descartes raises the central questions of modem philosophy.
sentences.cn: 笛卡尔提出了现代哲学的核心问题.

sentences.en: Does your computer have a modem?
sentences.cn: 你的电脑有调制解调器 吗 ?

sentences.en: He sent his work to his publishers by modem.
sentences.cn: 他通过网络把作品发给了出版商。

sentences.en: It allows modem pooling, which looks like a single connection to users.
sentences.cn: 它还可以要用Modem池, 用户看起来像是单一连接.

sentences.en: Nintendo hopes to price the add-on modem at less than $200.
sentences.cn: 任天堂希望将该外挂调制解调器的价格定在200美元以下。

sentences.en: PSTN lines delivered to our equipment at GBOX for out of band management via modem.
sentences.cn: 需要2PSTN线通过GBOX接入到我们的设备,我们通过MODEM管理.

sentences.en: Select the protocol tab and un - check all protocol except modem.
sentences.cn: 选择 Protocolstab,不要选取所有的协议,除Modem之外.

sentences.en: The application of APRO made the implementation of modem functions easier.
sentences.cn: APRO组件的开发应用,使各种modem功能的实现更加方便.

sentences.en: The control over MODEM by rock - bottom single - chip computer system is the base of effective communication.
sentences.cn: 底层 单片机系统 对Modem的控制是数据有效传输的基础.

sentences.en: The main driver for modem market growth, particularly the international market, is the Internet.
sentences.cn: 推动Modem市尝尤其是在国际市场上增长的主要动力是因特网.

sentences.en: The sub - system use AT commands to control the MODEM communication.
sentences.cn: 上下位机的远程通信是采用MODEM挂接电话线的方法.

sentences.en: With a 10 Mbps Cable modem, that same file can be downloaded in 8 seconds.
sentences.cn: 而通过10Mbps的有线电视Modem, 同样的文件只要8秒钟就能下载完.

trans.tran_en: a piece of electronic equipment that allows information from one computer to be sent along telephone wires to another computer
